flavorText: For the first time in her life, Vraska tried to prevent death.

foreignData.flavorText: Zum ersten Mal in ihrem Leben versuchte Vraska, einen Tod zu verhindern.
foreignData.name: Gefährliche Reise
foreignData.text: Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du nicht kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Falls ihre umgewandelten Manakosten 2 oder weniger betrugen, wende Hellsicht 2 an.

foreignData.flavorText: Por primera vez en su vida, Vraska intentó evitar la muerte.
foreignData.name: Travesía peligrosa
foreignData.text: Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que no controles a la mano de su propietario. Si su coste de maná convertido era de 2 o menos, adivina 2.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour la première fois de sa vie, Vraska tenta d'empêcher un décès.
foreignData.name: Voyage périlleux
foreignData.text: Renvoyez un permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas dans la main de son propriétaire. Si son coût converti de mana était inférieur ou égal à 2, regard 2.

foreignData.flavorText: Per la prima volta nella sua vita, Vraska cercò di impedire la morte di qualcuno.
foreignData.name: Viaggio Pericoloso
foreignData.text: Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio che non controlli in mano al suo proprietario. Se il suo costo di mana convertito era pari o inferiore a 2, profetizza 2.

foreignData.flavorText: 生まれて初めて、ヴラスカは死を阻もうとした。
foreignData.name: 危険な航海
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしておらず土地でもないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。それの点数で見たマナ・コストが２以下であったなら、占術２を行う。

foreignData.name: 위험한 항해
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하지 않는 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 그 지속물의 전환마나비용이 2 이하라면, 점술 2를 한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Pela primeira vez na vida, Vraska tentou evitar a morte de alguém.
foreignData.name: Viagem Perigosa
foreignData.text: Devolva a permanente alvo que você não controla que não seja um terreno para a mão de seu dono. Se seu custo de mana convertido era igual ou inferior a 2, use vidência 2.

foreignData.flavorText: В первый раз за всю свою жизнь Враска пыталась предотвратить смерть.
foreignData.name: Опасное Путешествие
foreignData.text: Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент, который не находится под вашим контролем, в руку его владельца. Если его конвертированная мана-стоимость была 2 или меньше, предскажите 2.

foreignData.flavorText: 这是瓦丝卡有生以来第一次想要救人活命。
foreignData.name: 险恶旅程
foreignData.text: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果其总法术力费用等于或小于2，则占卜2。

foreignData.flavorText: 這是瓦絲卡有生以來第一次想要救人活命。
foreignData.name: 險惡旅程
foreignData.text: 將目標不由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。如果其總魔法力費用等於或小於2，則占卜2。

name: Perilous Voyage
originalText: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its converted mana cost was 2 or less, scry 2.

rulings.text: If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Perilous Voyage resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t scry.
Use the permanent’s converted mana cost as it existed on the battlefield to determine whether you scry.
If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

text: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 2 or less, scry 2.
